column4: After years of gentoo I thought I would give ubunto a try.. I'm liking it... the problemn is I have a proliant server. I'm trying to get a 1280x768 resolution it has a ati rage xl video car.. is there a easyway to fix it?
is there a better video card driver for ATI Rage.. that could fix the screen resolution?
what exactly is the problem, drivers or just setting a constant resolution?
you're using the default drivers or have you tried downloading the official ones? I'm no expert with ATI though.
